displayName.text: BNY Dental P.C., Natalia Bartkova, DDS

formattedAddress: 425 E 79th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 425 E 79th St, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: Dr.Bartkova is by far one of the best dentist. She is extremely gentle and patient. Her prices are very reasonable and she actually cares about her patients.

text.text: Dr.Bartkova is by far one of the best dentist. She is extremely gentle and patient. Her prices are very reasonable and she actually cares about her patients.

originalText.text: Dr. Bartkova is a great dentist. Anytime I am in NYC, I try to see her. She is detailed, calming, and has decades of experience. I have had complex dental situations throughout the years and she has always offered very good advice and care.

text.text: Dr. Bartkova is a great dentist. Anytime I am in NYC, I try to see her. She is detailed, calming, and has decades of experience. I have had complex dental situations throughout the years and she has always offered very good advice and care.

originalText.text: I had problems with a couple of my teeth and gums. Dr. Bartkova helped me a lot, she was very professional and attentive. She had to extract one of my teeth, quickly, no pain, no complications. I had a gum treatment very effective and she gave me helpful care tips. Thank her very much. I highly recommend Dr. Bartkova as an excellent dentist.

text.text: I had problems with a couple of my teeth and gums. Dr. Bartkova helped me a lot, she was very professional and attentive. She had to extract one of my teeth, quickly, no pain, no complications. I had a gum treatment very effective and she gave me helpful care tips. Thank her very much. I highly recommend Dr. Bartkova as an excellent dentist.

originalText.text: Dr. Bartkova is the best dentist. She is friendly and gentle. All dental care was painless. She patiently explained all of my options for dental care. All of the dental work was first rate. And her prices are very reasonable.

text.text: Dr. Bartkova is the best dentist. She is friendly and gentle. All dental care was painless. She patiently explained all of my options for dental care. All of the dental work was first rate. And her prices are very reasonable.

originalText.text: I have been going to Dr. Bartkova for over 15 years for all my dental needs.  She is quite skilled and versatile in the services she offers. I have had root canals taken care of by her and have been fitted for an implement for my TMJ.  She is an expert dentist with a lovely low key bedside manner.  I recommend her without reservation
